Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.lex.interactionkit.internal.audio

Class AudioRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.lex.interactionkit.internal.audio.AudioRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AudioSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexAudioRecorder
    public class AudioRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements AudioSource
    An AudioRecorder used to record audio and write audio data to an OutputStream.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ANDROID_PERMISSION_RECORD_AUDIO

      Default value for the number of channels of the audio format the audio recorder will use.

      Default audio format the audio recorder will use.

      Default value for how often the recorder position notification goes out.
      static int DEFAULT_SAMPLE_RATE
      Default value for the number of samples the audio recorder will sample each second.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The TAG used for logging.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioRecorder

        public AudioRecorder​(android.content.Context context,
                     com.google.common.net.MediaType mediaType,
                     int recorderPositionNotificationPeriod,
                     int sampleRate,
                     int channels,
                     int format)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new recorder with given context, media type, sample rate, channel configuration, audio format, and buffer size.
        Parameters:
        context - the context used to access the AudioRecord framework.
        mediaType - the audio media format.
        recorderPositionNotificationPeriod - the notification period for updating the recorder position in milliseconds.
        sampleRate - the number of samples the audio recorder will sample each second.
        channels - the number of channels of the audio format the audio recorder will use.
        format - the audio format the audio recorder will use.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if failed to create audio recorder instance.

      • AudioRecorder

        public AudioRecorder​(android.content.Context context,
                     com.google.common.net.MediaType mediaType,
                     int numSamplesPerRead,
                     int recorderPositionNotificationPeriod,
                     android.media.AudioRecord audioRecord)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new audio recorder with a custom record buffer size. Used for testing.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context used to access the AudioRecord framework.
        mediaType - the audio media format.
        numSamplesPerRead - the number of samples to request when recording audio.
        recorderPositionNotificationPeriod - the notification period for updating the recorder position in milliseconds.
        audioRecord - the audio recorder used to record audio.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if failed to create audio recorder instance.

      • startRecording

        public void startRecording()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to setup, start the recorder, and read data. When recorder is stopped by the user, clean up resources.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when there are problems while recording audio.
